title: ‘I feel great now, we got a dub’ | Bills react to final road game victory of 2025 regular season
snippet: Buffalo beat Cleveland on Sunday in its final road game of the 2025 season. The Bills are on a four-game win streak, which started back in Week 13 against Pittsburgh.
